file_content.text: It's beautiful, how the beacons reflect off the snow.
I can see the beacons. I tip my hat to you. Saved my life.
Time to gather the dead. Head back to camp. Start the transports. Thank you.
Plant the sensors. Keep your guard up.
I have a lot of respect for anyone who comes to Hoth, more for anyone who's willing to wander around out here.
Cold goes right to your bones. Going to sleep is the same as giving up.
I don't care what the weather's like. I get what I want.
The things I do for power.
Desire. Keeps people alive who should've been long dead.
I just hunt the bounties, wherever they are.
It's a job.
Maybe that big blaster keeps you warm.
I didn't have a choice. I do what the mission requires.
I'm on a vital mission.
Sure, we all do. Then we wind up dead. That's just luck for people like us. People who obey.
I go where my master commands.
Darth Baras's orders.
Different for a Sith, right? Force keeps you warm.
How long has it been since you've slept?
You don't sleep?
Thirty-seven hours, fourteen minutes and thirty-one seconds. Couple buddies went to sleep the other day. Snow buried them where they laid.
You're far from anywhere.
You see that snowdrift? Big sinkhole there. Empire wants to run transports through this area, but you can't see the ground in front of you in a blizzard.
Next thing, you've fallen in a sinkhole. Like the planet dug you a grave.
I'm supposed to set up warning beacons around the perimeter. But it's a wampa hunting ground, and there's nothing I can do but wait.
You can't wait out here forever. It's too cold.
You'll die out here.
No choice. It's the mission.
Good luck with that.
Probably die out here, but thanks.
Unless you could help? You might be able to do it. Strong. Combat-trained. Yes. Good idea.
I'll try.
Let me handle it.
If it's my duty to die, I accept. But thank you.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
All right. I will wait.
I can do it.
Yes. You could. Combat-trained. Yes.
Take the sensors. Plant them around the sinkhole. Watch out for wampas... good luck.
Busy. Waiting. Watching.
